channel.title: MapRegions
channel.description:
Ok, Most servers these days are coming with a World and Region Class. Why are they there? Ever since I implemented that system the same way all the other servers are, I can't access an areas. For example, tutorial island, any rc altars, etc.
EDIT: Ok I fixed it. In the attempts to search for a specific object loaded onto the map, The System.out.println's must have slowed down that process and prevented the map region from loading correctly.
I would Still like to know why people made 2 whole new classes, to replace wat was(to the best of my knowledge) working erfectly fine.

item.title: MapRegions
item.dc:creator: @zyle1992 Zymus
item.description:
@zyle1992 wrote:

Ok, Most servers these days are coming with a World and Region Class. Why are they there? Ever since I implemented that system the same way all the other servers are, I can’t access an areas. For example, tutorial island, any rc altars, etc.

EDIT: Ok I fixed it. In the attempts to search for a specific object loaded onto the map, The System.out.println’s must have slowed down that process and prevented the map region from loading correctly.

I would Still like to know why people made 2 whole new classes, to replace wat was(to the best of my knowledge) working erfectly fine.
